rows.label: tev001594_MSG0001
rows.name:
Don't look so surprised, [ST:playername ].
And close your mouth before something flies inside it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001594_MSG0002
rows.name: Yes, it's true—even I enjoy the company of animals.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001594_MSG0003
rows.name:
After slogging around with wretched humans all day,
the serenity of a friendly pet is just what I need.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001594_MSG0004
rows.name: Or do you think I should only pet pure-breed cats?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001594_JNK0010
rows.name: Affirm[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001594_SEL0011
rows.name: Say that the Murderess seems like the refined-cat type.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001594_JNK0020
rows.name: Disagree[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001594_SEL0021
rows.name: Tell the Murderess that mangy strays fit her perfectly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001594_MSG0010
rows.name:
Oh? A show-class feline with the finest possible
pedigree? Perhaps a handler or two?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001594_MSG0011
rows.name:
I suppose I understand how you might think that,
what with my wealthy upbringing and all.
But no—I think I've moved past such things.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001594_MSG0012
rows.name: Now I just want a pet that can keep up with me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001594_MSG0013
rows.name:
Price and breeding don't matter at all.
I just want a pet that matches my personality.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001594_MSG0014
rows.name:
That's why I'm really more of a dog person than
a cat person.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001594_MSG0016
rows.name: That may indeed be the right pet for who I am now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001594_MSG0017
rows.name: But a stray cat would just make me lonely.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001594_MSG0018
rows.name:
They're always wandering off somewhere. And when
you come home and they're gone, you can't help but
worry about what happened to them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001594_MSG0019
rows.name: I think that's why I'd rather have a dog.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001594_MSG0021
rows.name: Actually, what I REALLY want is a manservant.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001594_JNK0030
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001594_SEL0031
rows.name:
Ask the Murderess if that would
help her revive her family name.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001594_JNK0040
rows.name: Offer[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001594_SEL0041
rows.name: Say that you're available for the servant gig.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001594_MSG0027
rows.name: That's a fine point.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001594_MSG0028
rows.name: Reviving my house means reclaiming our power.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001594_MSG0029
rows.name:
Only when we're widely feared and/or respected can
I truly say that House Effinger has been restored.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001594_MSG0030
rows.name: But I would certainly need servants to attend me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001594_MSG0031
rows.name:
Mark my words—one day you'll be on your hands and
knees begging for the job.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001594_MSG0032
rows.name:
Heh heh. That would be a sight to see for sure.
Anyway, I’ll see you around. Toodles![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001594_MSG0035
rows.name: I had a feeling you'd be interested.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001594_MSG0036
rows.name:
Once we've acquired a house, you'll live and work
on the premises.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001594_MSG0037
rows.name:
But I'll allow you to accompany me outside of the home
for BLADE missions—assuming that all the dusting has
been completed to my satisfaction.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001594_MSG0038
rows.name:
Ah, what a pleasant thought. I know you were only
joking, but it delighted me all the same. Thank you.[ST:wait ]
